about_the_game:
Join the ranks of the best SPLEEF agents on flat earth, where bombs are your weapons, and your friend is your nemesis. In this chaotic third-person multiplayer mayhem, you'll take on the role of a fearless agent, armed with nothing but your trusty bomb launcher and an insatiable appetite for mayhem.

Forget about traditional shooting combat; here you'll be knocking out your foes directly or creating treacherous holes to send them (or, ahem, you) plummeting into the abyss.

But beware! Your opponents are equally armed and equally devious. One wrong move, and you might find yourself plunging into the depths, cursing the day you ever enlisted. It's a delicate dance of destruction, where strategy and reflexes reign supreme.

Prepare for intense multiplayer matches where friendships will be tested, alliances betrayed, and the only rule is to spleef or be spleefed. Join the ranks of the SPLEEF elite, and prove your worth in the ultimate battle of bombs and brutality!

The rules are simple: Shoot a bomb directly at your opponents for an instant kill, or blow a hole in the floor and knock them in with the bomb's impact. The player that dies the least number of times wins the round.

There are four players per round (including bots).

For single-player mode: Host a private server so no one can join your game.

For multi-player mode: Host a public server so your friends can find your game. Please keep in mind that your friends may experience a slight lag.
